aboutme1: Hi, I am a Frontend developer based in Bavaria, Germany. Currently, I am undergoing my backend training at the Developer Academy in Munich and I aspire to transition into Cyber Security.
aboutme2: I am very interested in Pentesting, finding vulnerabilities, but also in closing them and helping to build a secure network and backend as a whole. Additionally, I aim to attain at least a bachelor's degree in Cyber Security.
aboutme3: I previously served in the German army for 8 years in a mountain platoon. During this time, I learned discipline, camaraderie, endurance, and the determination to accomplish my mission.
skills: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.
portfolio: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
